prompt: （多选题）Last weekend, we went to the countryside. We milked cows, rode horses, and fed chickens. We $$\underline{}$$ .
answer_option:
A.had fun
B.had a fun
C.had a good time
D.enjoyed ourselves
E.What's the price of the sweater?
F.I'm twelve years old
G.No matter where
H.in order that
I.aren't
J.table tennis
K.egg
L.Some dinosaurs ate m$$\underline{}$$t for food
M.How much are these socks?
analysis: 考查动词词组。句意：上周末，我们去了乡下。 我们挤牛奶，骑马，喂鸡，我们玩得很开心。have a good time=enjoy oneself=have fun, 均表示 "玩得高兴" ，故答案为：A、B、C。

prompt: Which of the following sentences is correct?
answer_option:
A.The hens lay eggs in the chicken coop
B.Little Johnny has laid in bed for 3 days
C.Don't believe him
D.Sam laid his books on his desk
E.Go straight
F.spends; on
G.pays; for
H.what; think of
I.egg
J.Yes, please
K.had fun
L.hundreds of
M.Five minutes' drive
N.look after
analysis: 考查lie, lay和laid的用法。句意：下面哪个句子是正确的？选项A中表达的是别相信他说的话，他在骗你。而如果表达说谎应该说的是lying。因此是错误的，排除。选项B中表达的是山姆把他的书放在书桌上。laid是lay的过去式，译为放置，因此是正确的。选项C中表达的是母鸡在鸡舍里下蛋。lay eggs译为下蛋，因此是正确的。选项D中说的是小约翰尼在床上躺了3天了。因此应该用现在完成进行时，需要将句中的has laid变成has been lying，因此是错误的，排除。故选：B和C。

prompt: Thanks for your invitation, but I can't go to the party. Because I have to $$\underline{}$$ my baby at home.
answer_option:
A.care for
B.take care of
C.take after
D.look after
E.Five kilometers
F.I'm twelve years old
G.That's a good idea
H.what; like
I.Sounds good
J.How old are you? ↗
K.table tennis
L.Go along
M.hundreds of
analysis: 考查动词短语辨析。句意：谢谢你的邀请，但我不能去参加聚会了。因为我必须在家照顾我的孩子。A. take care of照顾；B. care for照顾；C. take after与……相像；D. look after照顾。结合语境，故答案为：ABD。

prompt: It's $$\underline{}$$ outside. $$\underline{}$$ children want to go out to skate.
answer_option:
A.snowing; Each
B.snowing; All
C.raining; Every
D.That's a good idea
E.as soon as
F.Five minutes' drive
G.Don't believe him
H.No matter where
I.takes; to
J.who
K.Good night
L.whom
M.Good morning
analysis: 考查单词辨析。句意：外面正在下雪，所有孩子都想出去滑雪。根据下文的skate滑雪，可知应选snowing下雪；raining下雨，不符合句意。children为名词复数，应用all修饰，表示 "所有的" 。each/every+名词单数，表示 "每个" 。故答案为C。

prompt: You should try to be friendlier to your classmates $$\underline{}$$ you will be more popular among them.
answer_option:
A.so that
B.as soon as
C.in order to
D.in order that
E.What's the price of the sweater?
F.It is said a fish h$$\underline{}$$d is good for the brain
G.That's a good idea
H.Thank you
I.is
J.Yellowstone National Park
K.raining; Every
L.What's your name? ↗
M.Good afternoon
N.panda
analysis: 考查连词。句意：你应该试着对你的同学更友好，这样你就会在他们中间更受欢迎。A. so that以便于，后跟从句；B. in order to为了，后跟动词原形；C. as soon as一……就……；D. in order that以便，后跟从句。结合语境以及题干空后接从句，故答案为：AD。

prompt: $$\underline{}$$ you drive, you must drive carefully.
answer_option:
A.No matter how
B.No matter when
C.In order that
D.No matter where
E.It isn't nice
F.Do you sell ice-cream?
G.Go along
H.bread
I.had a fun
J.You are very nice to say so
K.table tennis
L.The w$$\underline{}$$ther is often changeable in Britain
M.Five-minutes ride
analysis: 考查状语从句。A：无论何处；B：为了；C：无论如何；D：无论何时；drive作动词，可搭配代替地点状语的where，也可以搭配代替时间状语的when；how需要搭配形容词或副词，题目中没有，所以不用how；in order that引导目的状语从句。句意：无论你何时/何地开车，你都要小心驾驶。故答案选：A和D。

prompt: Tom $$\underline{}$$ two hours $$\underline{}$$ English eyery day.
answer_option:
A.spends; on
B.pays; for
C.spends; studying
D.takes; to
E.look after
F.pears
G.Go away
H.milk
I.Yes, please
J.panda
K.take after
L.enjoyed ourselves
M.Go along
analysis: 考查谓语动词。spend time doing something=spend time on something 花时间做某事/在某事上。句意：汤姆每天花两小时在（学）英语上。故答案为：A、B。

prompt: There are about $$\underline{}$$ books about history in my bookcse. You can read them if you like.
answer_option:
A.hundred of
B.three hundred
C.three hundreds of
D.hundreds of
E.had fun
F.Good night
G.what; like
H.whom
I.How old are you? ↗
J.He is 35
K.take after
L.How much are these socks?
M.is
N.Little Johnny has laid in bed for 3 days
analysis: 考查数词。句意为：我的书柜里大约有300本关于历史的书。如果你喜欢，你可以读。hundred，百，当与具体的数字连用时，需要使用其单数形式，表示实指；当与of连用时，需要使用其复数形式，表示虚指。排除A、C选项；hundreds of 数以百计的，本身表示虚指，前面无需使用about，排除D选项。故选：B。
knowledge_tree: 词法-数词-基数词-普通数字

prompt:
—May I have some $$\underline{}$$ ? 

—Yes. Here you are.
answer_option:
A.bread
B.egg
C.pears
D.milk
E.hundred of
F.Sounds good
G.the Great Barrier Reef
H.He is fine
I.No, thanks
J.as soon as
K.No matter how
L.had a good time
M.Yes, please
N.how; like
analysis: 本题考查名词的辨析。A.egg "鸡蛋" ；B.bread "面包" ；C.pears "梨" ；D.milk "牛奶" 。根据空格前的some修饰可数名词复数或不可数名词，排除A。句意：—我可以吃些面包/吃些梨/喝些牛奶吗？—可以。给你。故答案选：B、C、D。
knowledge_tree: 词法-名词-名词辨析-可数及不可数辨析

prompt:
—Excuse me, could you please tell me the way to the nearest post office? 

—Sure. $$\underline{}$$ the road and turn left, and you'll see it in front of you.
answer_option:
A.Go away
B.Go along
C.Go straight
D.Go down
E.look after
F.Yes, please
G.Five minutes
H.Good night
I.enjoyed ourselves
J.milk
K.Some dinosaurs ate m$$\underline{}$$t for food
L.The w$$\underline{}$$ther is often changeable in Britain
M.Five-minutes ride
analysis: 句意：——打扰一下，你能告诉我去最近的邮局的路吗？  ——当然。沿着马路左转，你会看到它就在你面前。考查短语的词义辨析。Go along沿着；Go straight直行； Go down沿着；Go away走开。根据“...the road and turn left, and you’ll see it in front of you.”可知，此处应该是沿着这条路，又因这题是多选题。故选AC。

prompt:
（多选题）— $$\underline{}$$?

—It's 25 yuan.
answer_option:
A.How much are these socks?
B.How much is this pair of socks?
C.Do you sell ice-cream?
D.What's the price of the sweater?
E.care for
F.Five minutes' drive
G.No matter when
H.In order that
I.who
J.how; like
K.That's a good idea
L.egg
M.as soon as
N.take after
analysis: 考查价格。句意：—这双袜子多少钱？这件毛衣多少钱？—25元。根据答语“It's 25 yuan.”可知上文是对价格进行提问；提问价格的句型为：How much is +可数名词单数/不可数名词？答语：It's+价格；How much are+可数名词的复数？答语：They are+价格；What's the price of…？，答语：It's+价格。结合选项，可知B、C选项均符合题意。故选B、C。
knowledge_tree: 句法-句子分类（语气）-疑问句-特殊疑问句-be动词类型特殊疑问句

prompt: There $$\underline{}$$ any apples in the box. Let's go and buy some.
answer_option:
A.is
B.isn't
C.aren't
D.are
E.Good evening
F.take after
G.He is fine
H.Five kilometers
I.look after
J.Yes, I'd love to
K.No matter how
L.Yes, please
M.Go down
N.You are welcome
analysis: 考查there be句型和主谓一致。句意：盒子里没有苹果。我们去买一些吧。根据空后的名词apples为复数形式，可知be动词要选用are，因此排除A项和B项，再根据空后的any和句意可知，这里应该用否定形式，因此排除D项。故选：C。

prompt: Confucius was a famous thinker $$\underline{}$$ lived in China about 2,500 years ago.
answer_option:
A.who
B.which
C.whom
D.that
E.How much are these socks?
F.in order that
G.enjoyed ourselves
H.You are welcome
I.milk
J.Go down
K.care for
L.It isn't nice
M.snowing; All
N.Good evening
analysis: 考查关系代词。句意：孔子是大约2500年前生活在中国的著名思想家。分析句子结构可知，先行词thinker在从句中指人，且作主语，因此关系代词用who或that，故选B和C。

prompt:
多选题

—Lisa, $$\underline{}$$ do you $$\underline{}$$ your school trip? 

—It was excellent. We went to the zoo and took some photos.
answer_option:
A.how; like
B.what; like
C.how; feel about
D.what; think of
E.You are very nice to say so
F.Good afternoon
G.had a fun
H.In order that
I.three hundred
J.Some dinosaurs ate m$$\underline{}$$t for food
K.The hens lay eggs in the chicken coop
L.He is 35
M.Five minutes' drive
N.in order to
analysis: 考查常用句型。how do you like sth. = what do you think of sth. = how do you feel about sth. 意为 "你觉得……怎么样？" B、C、D选项均正确。句意：—丽萨，你觉得你的学校旅行怎么样？—非常好！我们去了动物园并拍了一些照片。故答案为：B；C；D。
knowledge_tree: 基础知识-中考常用短语与句型

prompt:
—How far is it from your home to school? 

— $$\underline{}$$
answer_option:
A.Five minutes
B.Five minutes' drive
C.Five kilometers
D.Five-minutes ride
E.who
F.are
G.Good evening
H.He is 35
I.spends; studying
J.spends; on
K.Go straight
L.You are welcome
M.how; feel about
analysis: 考查情景交际。句意：—从你家到学校有多远？—五千米/五分钟车程。根据上句可知，本空应当回答距离。A选项是时间，所以排除；C选项中 "Five-minutes" 是复合形容词，名词minutes应用单数形式，所以排除。故选：BD。

prompt:
—How about eating dinner with me? My parents aren't at home. We can eat out.

— $$\underline{}$$
answer_option: A.Good luck
B.Yes, I'd love to
C.That's a good idea
D.Sounds good
E.Go down
F.He is fine
G.that
H.aren't
I.had a fun
J.Little Johnny has laid in bed for 3 days
K.Five kilometers
L.My name is Bob
M.spends; on
N.No matter when
analysis: 本题考查日常交际用语。A.Yes, I'd love to. "是的，我愿意去。" B.That's a good idea. "是个好主意。" C.Sounds good. "听起来不错。" D.Good luck. "祝你好运。" 根据问句意为：和我一起吃晚饭怎么样? 我父母不在家。我们可以出去吃。可知，答语应该是回答：自己很乐意去/这是一个好主意/听起来很棒。所以A、B、C三项都是正确的。故答案选：ABC。

prompt: Which of the following is RIGHT？
answer_option:
A.What's your name? ↗
B.My name is Bob
C.I'm twelve years old
D.How old are you? ↗
E.Yes, please
F.pays; for
G.Some dinosaurs ate m$$\underline{}$$t for food
H.isn't
I.raining; Every
J.Don't believe him
K.Good luck
L.What's the price of the sweater?
M.had fun
analysis: 考查语调。英语口语中，陈述句和特殊疑问句的语调一般为降调，A、C、D三项错误，B选项符合语法规则。故答案为B。

prompt: $$\underline{}$$ ladies and gentlemen. Today I'd like to share a few tricks for learning English.
answer_option:
A.Good morning
B.Good evening
C.Good night
D.Good afternoon
E.is
F.No, thanks
G.three hundreds of
H.whom
I.Little Johnny has laid in bed for 3 days
J.Yes, please
K.the Great Barrier Reef
L.That's a good idea
M.The hens lay eggs in the chicken coop
N.care for
analysis: 考查情景交际。A.Good morning 早上好，B.Good afternoon 下午好，C. Good night 晚安，D.Good evening 晚上好。句意：先生们，女士们，$$\underline{    }$$！今天将由我来分享几个学英语的小技巧。根据句意，可知ABD答案均可。故选：ABD。

prompt:
—Hi, Sally. Your watch is nice.

— $$\underline{}$$ .
answer_option:
A.Thank you
B.It isn't nice
C.No, thanks
D.Yes, please
E.Go straight
F.panda
G.take care of
H.spends; studying
I.Go away
J.how; like
K.milk
L.That's a good idea
M.Good evening
N.pays; for
analysis: 考查情景交际用语。句意：—嗨，莎莉。你的手表很漂亮。—谢谢。A.No, thanks不了，谢谢；B.Yes, please好的，请；C.It isn't nice这不好；D.Thank you谢谢你。根据前文Your watch is nice.可知这是对方在夸你的手表好看，这时候你应该表示感谢，感谢对方的称赞。D选项Thank you符合题意。故选D。

prompt:
—How is your uncle?

— $$\underline{}$$.
answer_option:
A.He is fine
B.He is 35
C.He is Mike
D.What's the price of the sweater?
E.It is said a fish h$$\underline{}$$d is good for the brain
F.hundred of
G.take care of
H.aren't
I.spends; on
J.Sam laid his books on his desk
K.Yes, please
L.Go down
M.I'm twelve years old
analysis: 考查询问。句意：—你叔叔好吗？—他很好。根据"How is your uncle？"可知，此处询问身体状况，因此C项“他很好”符合语境。故选：C。

prompt:
—Your skirt looks nice on you!

—$$\underline{}$$.
answer_option:
A.Yes, please
B.Thank you
C.You are very nice to say so
D.You are welcome
E.Good luck
F.What's your name? ↗
G.Five-minutes ride
H.That's a good idea
I.Yes, I'd love to
J.had fun
K.as soon as
L.Five minutes' drive
M.Sam laid his books on his desk
N.Five kilometers
analysis: 考查情景交际用语。句意：—你穿裙子真好看！—谢谢你/你这么说真是太好了。A. Thank you 谢谢你；B. Yes, please 是的，请；C. You are welcome 不客气；D. You are very nice to say so 你这么说真是太好了。根据语境可知，此处要对他人的感谢作出回应，AD选项均符合。故选：AD。

prompt: 请从下列事物中勾出属于中国所特有的事物。
answer_option:
A.the Great Wall
B.table tennis
C.Yellowstone National Park
D.Shanghai
E.panda
F.the Great Barrier Reef
G.how; like
H.Yes, please
I.Good night
J.Good luck
K.milk
L.How much is this pair of socks?
M.had a fun
N.takes; to
O.Go along
analysis: 考查词义辨析和中国文化。A.the Great Barrier Reef "大堡礁" ，是属于澳大利亚的。B.Yellowstone National Park "黄石国家公园" ，是属于美国的。C.the Great Wall "长城" ，是中国的。D.panda "大熊猫" ，是中国特有的珍稀动物。E.Shanghai "上海" ，是中国的城市。F.table tennis "乒乓球" ，中国的乒乓球在世界上是数一数二的特色。故答案选：CDEF。

prompt: Which of the following underlined parts is different in pronunciation from others?
answer_option:
A.The w$$\underline{}$$ther is often changeable in Britain
B.When the berries turn blue, they are r$$\underline{}$$dy to be picked
C.It is said a fish h$$\underline{}$$d is good for the brain
D.Some dinosaurs ate m$$\underline{}$$t for food
E.what; think of
F.Don't believe him
G.whom
H.In order that
I.pays; for
J.had fun
K.Thank you
L.so that
M.The hens lay eggs in the chicken coop
N.take after
analysis: 考查音标。句意：以下哪一个下划线部分在发音上与其他部分不同？A. /e/；B. /e/；C. /e/；D. /iː/。根据划线部分读音可知，D项与其他三项不同。故选：D。
